info.title: Site Bay
info.description: OpenAPI schema for the Agency plan. Access for only $99USD per month!

get.description:
Check if a domain is correctly set up for Site Bay WordPress Hosting.
Your site's DNS records need a CNAME pointed at $CITY.sitebay.org where $CITY is a valid region's city name

put.description: Select your default payment method to charge every billing cycle

200.description: JSON list of your payment methods

get.description: Get details about all of your live sites

schema.title: Response Get Sites Live Api V1 Site Live Get

post.description: Create a new site by providing your domain and your site's WordPress details

get.description: Get details about your live site

delete.description: This permanently deletes your site, and its stage site if one exists

put.description: Send a bash shell command to your site, such as a WP-CLI command

post.description: Purges the Cloudflare CDN cache for your site

put.description: Add/Delete an IP from the wp-login firewall

patch.description: Enable or disable HTTP Basic Authentication
Enable or disable HTTP Basic Authentication

get.description: Get details about your site's external path configs

post.description: Connect an external URL to your site on a subpath

delete.description: Delete the link between an external URL and your site

get.description: Get a nameserver configured site's DNS records

put.description:
Allows a nameserver configured site to update DNS records
Domain Option: NS

get.description: Get the required records for our custom email service

200.description: JSON list of requisite DNS records

delete.description:
Info: Allows user to delete DNS records
Returns: Template Page
Permissions: Member
Domain Option: NS

get.description:
Get your site's plan usage for a given period.

- **start**: The beginning of the usage period
- **end**: The end of the usage period

schema.title: Response Get Tags Api V1 Site Live  Fqdn  Tag Get

post.description:
Create a tag for organizational purposes

- **name**: each tag must have a name

Create a Site Bay custom email. You can create a forward email which just forwards to another email provider, such as gmail.
You can create a managed email by leaving the "forward_to_email" param blank and including a "password" param.
You can also make this a catchall by calling PATCH "/{fqdn}/email/{user_email_address}".
Your password must meet password strength requirements.

get.description: Get a list of wp-content files at a point in time
Get all the results of a site's restores to a previous point in time

post.description: Restore your site to a previous point in time, down to the minute

get.description: Get the results of a site's restore to a previous point in time
